name: Eva Ness' Darkest Secrets
description:
Eva's lost in her own mind again, facing off against the things she'd rather not reveal to the world, or face herself.

Join her in her battle against anxiety, shame, impostor syndrome and a Tofu Dragon.

Controls:

WASD/ARROW KEYS - Move

SPACE - Jump

Fonts by SomePx: https://somepx.itch.io/more-fonts
